mapper.sql: id, user_id, blog_name, blog_description, blog_avatar, blog_cover, blog_notice, personal_tags, social_links, is_public, total_articles, points_cost, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_config ( user_id, blog_name, blog_description, blog_avatar, blog_cover, blog_notice, personal_tags, social_links, is_public, total_articles, points_cost, status, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{blogName}, #{blogDescription}, #{blogAvatar}, #{blogCover}, #{blogNotice}, #{personalTags}, #{socialLinks}, #{isPublic}, 0, 50, 1, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE blog_config SET total_articles = total_articles + #{increment}, update_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM blog_config WHERE status = 1

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT bc.user_id) FROM blog_config bc INNER JOIN blog_article ba ON bc.user_id = ba.user_id WHERE bc.status = 1 AND ba.status = 1 AND ba.publish_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
